summary: This is an email from April 20, 2020, discussing investigative efforts regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's whereabouts, specifically at a location in Manchester by the Sea. It mentions coordination with an SSRA from Boston, inquiries from SONY management, and the impact of grand jury schedules on the investigation.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The email discusses efforts to gain information about her being at a location in Manchester by the Sea and when she was last seen at a residence.

persons.name: SSRA from Boston
persons.context: The email asks about recent contact with this individual regarding Maxwell and discusses who should follow up with them directly.

connections.description: The SSRA is involved in gaining information about Maxwell's location and activities.

events.title: Email coordination about Maxwell investigation
events.description: An email is sent discussing follow-up with Boston law enforcement (SSRA) about information on Ghislaine Maxwell's whereabouts at a location in Manchester by the Sea.

keyFacts: The document is an email from April 20, 2020, showing active investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell's whereabouts.
It references a specific location of interest: Manchester by the Sea.
It mentions that SONY management is positive about a memo sent up the chain regarding 'GM' (likely Ghislaine Maxwell), but timing depends on grand juries restarting.
Investigators had follow-up questions about Maxwell's location and when she was last seen at a residence.
The email coordinates whether to contact the SSRA from Boston directly or through another party.
